name: EARTHMAN
description:
Made in under 48 hours for Paint Jam 2021.

After your hometown, Great, is pillaged by Martians for its supply of Campbell's Soup, you are abducted and take it upon yourself to reclaim the soup from the Martians. Will you be victorious? Or will you just become one of them? 

Battle various aliens with the power of Soup. Destroy them. Fight. Win. Buy more Soup. Repeat. 

The original game is by xemdev, and can be found here.
